pageContent:
Flowise is an open source project which will always be free for commercial and personal use.
It is based on ü¶úÔ∏èüîó LangChain.js and is a very advanced Graphic User Interface for developing LLM based applications.
These applications are also known as Gen Apps, LLM Apps, Prompt Chaining, LLM Chains, etc.
These include Prompt Engineering, Agents, Chaining, Semantic Search, Chat Models, Vector Stores and various tools which can be assigned to an Agent to action.
With LLM-based chat flows, the conversation design and build process is less granular and much of the detail and minutia of exception handling, chit-chat (small talk), repair paths and more, can be offloaded to the LLM‚Äôs resilience.
Even though Flowise is free to use, cost considerations need to be given to hosting. Add to this all the third party API calls, cost will be incurred.
These costs can escalate quite quickly based on user volumes and to what extend these systems are leveraged.
Flowise is such an intuitive LLM App development framework. Even though I am in early stages of prototyping with Flowise, I do get the sense that Flowise is a much more rounded and complete development UI than LangFlow.
Below you see the dashboard with API keys, Marketplaces and Chatflows. Notice how the development components constituting the chat flow is listed.
There is a marketplace available with quite a number of pre-configured applications which serves to fast track users to the point of having a working prototype.

metadata.title: Flowise For LangChain - Cobus Greyling - Medium
metadata.snippet: Flowise For LangChain. Flowise is an open source Graphic User Interface to build LLM based applications on LangChain. Cobus Greyling.

pageContent:
There is a marketplace available with quite a number of pre-configured applications which serves to fast track users to the point of having a working prototype.
The application below is a basic weather bot, and probably the simplest LLM Chain which can written, with only three components. OpenAI connector, Prompt Template and the LLM chain connecting the two.
The application below shows a basic translation bot and it also illustrates how prompt values can be formatted.
Below is a general knowledge conversational chatbot which leverages OpenAI, the Serp API and holds conversational memory.
Below is the conversation I had with the chatbot, notice how conversational context is maintained throughout the conversation.
What I find exciting is how the development environment is unfolding and how different design and development affordances are taking shape.
Makers will have to explore how to translate their requirements into the different development components available.
I‚Äôm currently the Chief Evangelist @ HumanFirst. I explore and write about all things at the intersection of AI and language. Including NLU design, evaluation & optimisation. Data-centric prompt tuning and LLM observability, supervision and fine-tuning.
Chief Evangelist @ HumanFirst. I explore and write about all things at the intersection of AI and language; NLP/NLU/LLM, Chat/Voicebots, CCAI.

metadata.title: Flowise For LangChain - Cobus Greyling - Medium
metadata.snippet: Flowise For LangChain. Flowise is an open source Graphic User Interface to build LLM based applications on LangChain. Cobus Greyling.

pageContent:
This allows for the creation of LLM chat utilities to be used on a website, or as a support API for traditional chatbot interfaces.
The web search chatbot shown below is reliant on OpenAI‚Äôs LLM and also leverages OpenAI Embeddings.
Below is the conversation I and with the web search bot, notice the concise and short answers the bot supplies, and how context is managed within the conversation.
In a previous post I gave a basic overview of how to build LLM based apps using Flowise. But where will these Generative Apps fit into real-world products and services?
Even-though it is quite possible to build a self-contained Gen App with the likes of Flowise or LangFlow, it is more probable that these LLM chains or autonomous agent applications will be used and accessed via an API as a supporting technology.
Traditional chatbot frameworks, customer support agents and more will most probably leverage LLM Apps via an API call. Rather than the LLM App being a complete chatbot/Conversational AI solution.
Considering the cost, possible latency and the lack of locally hosted API‚Äôs, LLM Apps will most probably be used as a utility for certain aspects of a conversational experience.
The image below shows a basic application consisting of only three elements; OpenAI, a prompt template and a LLM Chain combining those two elements.

metadata.title: Flowise Is A Graphical User Interface (GUI) for LangChain
metadata.snippet: In this post, I aim to demonstrate the ease and affordability of enabling web browsing for a chatbot through Flowise, as well as how easy it is to create a LLM- ...

pageContent:
The image below shows a basic application consisting of only three elements; OpenAI, a prompt template and a LLM Chain combining those two elements.
The prompt template is also basic with only one variable defined, question. It would make sense to quickly and efficiently expose this LLM App via an API to be incorporated into other chatbot frameworks.
In this Flowise example, any flow or application can efficiently be exposed as an API by clicking on the API button.
The complexity of the API is highly configurable, with additional parameters which can be passed via the API call. There are four different integration types available within Flowise.
The image below shows how the Flowise API is accessed via Postman and illustrates the ease with which an LLM API can be created.
A large language model app is a chain of one or multiple prompted calls to models or external services (such as APIs or data sources) in order to achieve a particular task.
Many new startups and software products are relying heavily on large language models and do not have a clear business differentiator.
While these companies may be successful in the short term, they will soon be overshadowed by companies that have more innovative products and services.
Considering the image below, for any technology provider to be sustainable, the UX needs to be compelling and stellar. Added to this, the propriety software or company specific intellectual property must be future proof.

metadata.title: Flowise Is A Graphical User Interface (GUI) for LangChain
metadata.snippet: In this post, I aim to demonstrate the ease and affordability of enabling web browsing for a chatbot through Flowise, as well as how easy it is to create a LLM- ...

pageContent:
And as seen with products like Flowise and LangFlow, really anyone can build intelligent LLM based APIs. Hence products which are really just a thin wrapper around a LLM will have a hard time proving their longevity and relevance.
Below is a video tutorial on three Flowise application types; web search, a single prompt chain and multiple prompt chains.
I‚Äôm currently the Chief Evangelist @ HumanFirst. I explore and write about all things at the intersection of AI and language; ranging from LLMs, Chatbots, Voicebots, Development Frameworks, Data-Centric latent spaces and more.
Chief Evangelist @ HumanFirst. I explore and write about all things at the intersection of AI and language; NLP/NLU/LLM, Chat/Voicebots, CCAI.

pageContent:
Don‚Äôt have any coding experience? Don‚Äôt worry. Check out this drag-and-drop tool that helps you to build your own customized LLM flows. And guess what, you don‚Äôt have to be a tech professional!
The hype around large language models (LLMs) is continuing to grow, with more and more companies releasing tools to make people's life easier. So what exactly are these tools that are helping build the world of LLMs? Well, one of them is Flowise AI
Flowise AI is an open-source UI visual tool used to help develop LangChain apps. Before we get into more about Flowise AI, let‚Äôs quickly define LangChain. LangChain is a framework/python library that helps you make use of LLMs to build your own custom NLP applications.
Flowise uses LangChain as its agent executor, Chroma as its vector store, OpenAI for embeddings, HuggingFace‚Äôs inference model, GitHub as a document loader, and SERP for query API. Its Graphic User Interface is very helpful in constructing LLM-based apps built on LangChain.js.¬†
So what makes it so easy and helpful? The drag-and-drop tool. Everybody loves a drag-and-drop, especially when you are customizing your NLP application. The even bigger plus is that it does not require any coding experience!
So how do I install this simple drag-and-drop customisable NLP tool? So there are 3 different ways you can install Flowise AI. Let‚Äôs go through all of them.

metadata.snippet: Before we get into more about Flowise AI, let's quickly define LangChain. LangChain is a framework/python library that helps you make use of LLMs to build your ...

pageContent:
So how do I install this simple drag-and-drop customisable NLP tool? So there are 3 different ways you can install Flowise AI. Let‚Äôs go through all of them.
So if you‚Äôre somebody new to the tech industry and have no coding experience or an organization that lacks a developer on your team - Flowise AI is the best option for you. If there are any current or previous users of Flowise reading this, let us know about your experience in the comments!

metadata.snippet: Before we get into more about Flowise AI, let's quickly define LangChain. LangChain is a framework/python library that helps you make use of LLMs to build your ...

pageContent:
In a recent blog post, ‚ÄúMeet LangFlow: A Drag-and-Drop UI for LangChain‚Äù, I explored the capabilities of LangFlow and how its intuitive, no-code interface can be leveraged.
Today, I‚Äôm excited to share another similar tool that offers a no-code, drag-and-drop experience: Flowise (https://flowiseai.com/).
Flowise serves as an exceptional tool for developers aiming to build LLM applications without delving into coding. It‚Äôs equally beneficial for organizations striving to rapidly prototype and develop LLM applications in an agile manner. Let‚Äôs take a look at some of the prominent features of Flowise AI:
Next, we‚Äôll walk through building two apps using Flowise, both of which require no coding.

metadata.title: Flowise: An Agile Way of LLM Application Development ...
metadata.snippet: Flowise serves as an exceptional tool for developers aiming to build LLM applications without delving into coding. It's equally beneficial for organizations ...

pageContent:
Curious about the buzz around Language Learning Models (LLMs)? Wondering what sets Flowise AI apart in this crowded field?
Stay tuned as we unravel the unique value of Flowise AI and answer the question on everyone‚Äôs mind: What is Flowise AI?
Flowise AI is an open-source UI visual tool specifically designed for building Language Learning Model (LLM) apps. It is based on LangChain and offers a user-friendly drag-and-drop interface that simplifies the construction of complex LLM models.
Ideal for both solo developers and larger teams, its open-source nature allows for extensive customization to meet specific needs.
Ever heard the phrase ‚Äúdrag and drop‚Äù? That‚Äôs pretty much the essence of Flowise AI‚Äôs interface. No need to break a sweat or get tangled in lines of code. With its intuitive drag-and-drop interface, you can create complex LLM apps like you‚Äôre building a playlist. Easy-peasy!
But wait, there‚Äôs more! Flowise AI is a low-code/no-code platform. What does that mean for you? Whether you‚Äôre a coding wizard or someone who doesn‚Äôt know the difference between Java and JavaScript, you can use Flowise AI.
And if you‚Äôre thinking about integrating it with other applications, Flowise AI has got you covered.
You can either use its API or embed a chat widget directly into your website. Plus, it even supports real-time streaming back to your frontend application. How cool is that?

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
You can either use its API or embed a chat widget directly into your website. Plus, it even supports real-time streaming back to your frontend application. How cool is that?
So, you know how you can customize settings on your phone or computer? Environment variables in Flowise AI work in a similar way; they‚Äôre the knobs and dials behind the scenes.
These variables are set in a .env file inside the packages/server folder, and they let you tailor your Flowise instance just the way you like it.
For instance, you can set the HTTP port Flowise runs on using the PORT variable. Want to secure your login? Use FLOWISE_USERNAME and FLOWISE_PASSWORD. Need to save API keys or encryption keys?

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: For instance, you can set the HTTP port Flowise runs on using the PORT variable. Want to secure your login? Use FLOWISE_USERNAME and FLOWISE_PASSWORD. Need to save API keys or encryption keys?

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
And get this, you can even control how predictions run. The EXECUTION_MODE variable lets you decide whether predictions run in their own process or the main process.
If you‚Äôre dealing with multiple intensive prediction tasks, you might want to set this to ‚Äòchild‚Äô to take advantage of multiple CPUs. Otherwise, ‚Äòmain‚Äô should do just fine.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
Alright, so you‚Äôve got your environment variables set up. What‚Äôs next? Databases! Flowise AI gives you options, and who doesn‚Äôt love options? You can choose from SQLite, MySQL, or PostgreSQL
SQLite is the default, but if you‚Äôre looking for something more robust, you can easily switch.
Here‚Äôs the cool part: configuring these databases is a breeze. For SQLite, all you need to do is set DATABASE_TYPE=sqlite and specify the DATABASE_PATH.
If MySQL or PostgreSQL is more your speed, you‚Äôll need to set a few more variables like DATABASE_PORT, DATABASE_HOST, DATABASE_NAME, DATABASE_USER, and DATABASE_PASSWORD.
And here‚Äôs a pro tip: Flowise uses Typeorm to manage these databases. By default, the synchronize option is set to true, meaning the database schema will be auto-created every time you launch the application.
But be careful with this in a production environment; you don‚Äôt want to lose your data.
Imagine you‚Äôve got a bunch of documents‚ÄîPDFs, TXT files, CSVs, you name it‚Äîand you want to feed them into your LLM app. Manually entering all that data sounds like a nightmare, right? Enter Document Loaders.
These handy tools in Flowise AI allow you to import documents from a variety of sources like PDF, TXT, CSV, and even platforms like Notion and Confluence.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: These handy tools in Flowise AI allow you to import documents from a variety of sources like PDF, TXT, CSV, and even platforms like Notion and Confluence. Just select your source, and voila! Your documents are imported and ready to be used.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
Just select your source, and voila! Your documents are imported and ready to be used.
But that‚Äôs not all. Document Loaders are often used in tandem with Vector Stores. What does that mean?
Once your documents are imported, they can be converted into numerical vectors, or embeddings, making it easier to find similar documents later on. It‚Äôs like having a super-smart filing system that knows exactly where everything is.
So, you want your LLM app to chat like a pro? That‚Äôs where Chat Models come in. These are the brains behind the conversational abilities of your app.
Think of them as the puppet masters pulling the strings to make your chat interactions as natural as possible.
Flowise AI supports a variety of chat models, including some big names like Azure ChatOpenAI, ChatLocalAI, and Google VertexAI. These models take a list of messages as input and spit out a model-generated message as output.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: It‚Äôs like having a virtual assistant that understands the context and can carry on a conversation seamlessly. And here‚Äôs the kicker: Flowise AI supports powerful models like gpt-3.5-turbo or gpt4, which are not only more effective but also more cost-efficient than older models. So, you‚Äôre getting top-notch performance without burning a hole in your pocket.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
You know how sometimes words just aren‚Äôt enough? Like, you need a way to capture the essence of a document or a piece of text? That‚Äôs where embeddings come into play in Flowise AI.
Embeddings are like the DNA of your text. They‚Äôre numerical vectors that capture the core meaning of your documents.
These vectors are super useful when you‚Äôre trying to find similar documents or when you‚Äôre feeding them into machine learning models.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: These vectors are super useful when you‚Äôre trying to find similar documents or when you‚Äôre feeding them into machine learning models.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
Flowise AI offers a variety of embedding models, including Azure OpenAI Embeddings and LocalAI Embeddings. Once your documents are embedded, they‚Äôre stored in Vector Stores, making it super easy to retrieve them later for similarity searches or other tasks.
So, in a nutshell, embeddings in Flowise AI are your go-to tool for turning text into something a machine can understand and work with efficiently.
Ever had a conversation where the other person forgets what you just said? Frustrating, right? Well, Flowise AI‚Äôs memory feature ensures that your chat interactions are nothing short of brilliant.
It‚Äôs like having a chatbot with a really good memory, one that remembers past conversations and uses that context to make future interactions more meaningful.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: It‚Äôs like having a chatbot with a really good memory, one that remembers past conversations and uses that context to make future interactions more meaningful.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
Flowise AI stores conversations in arrays or databases, and this stored data serves as the context for future interactions. So, if you‚Äôre asking a follow-up question, the chat model knows what you‚Äôre talking about because it remembers the previous conversation.
And it gets better! Flowise AI offers different types of memory storage methods, like Buffer Memory, Buffer Window Memory, Conversation Summary Memory, and Zep Memory. Each has its own unique way of storing and retrieving past conversations, giving you the flexibility to choose what best suits your needs.
Flowise AI is like a Swiss Army knife for your LLM app, offering a wide range of tools that agents can use to interact with the world. Here‚Äôs a quick rundown of some of the tools that Flowise AI supports:

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: Remember those embeddings we talked about earlier? Well, they need a home, and that‚Äôs where Vector Stores come in. Think of them as specialized databases designed to store and manage high-dimensional numerical vectors. It‚Äôs like having a dedicated library for all your numerical data.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: In Flowise AI, you have several options for vector store integrations. These stores have two main functions:

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
In Flowise AI, you have several options for vector store integrations. These stores have two main functions:
The beauty of Vector Stores is that they make similarity searches a breeze. Looking for a document that‚Äôs similar to another? The Vector Store has got your back, retrieving the most relevant vectors in a jiffy.
Wondering where you can host your Flowise AI instance? You‚Äôre not limited to just your local machine; there are several cloud services that make deployment a breeze.
So, you‚Äôre probably wondering, ‚ÄúWhat can I actually build with Flowise AI?‚Äù Great question! The possibilities are as vast as your imagination, but let‚Äôs break down some concrete examples to give you a better idea.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: Ever wanted to integrate a powerful conversational agent like GPT into your app? With Flowise AI, you can create a ChatGPT plugin that allows for seamless integration of GPT models into your LLM app. This enables you to have more natural, context-aware conversations with users, enhancing the overall user experience. Imagine a chatbot that not only answers customer queries but also remembers past interactions. With Flowise AI, you can build a support bot that offers personalized solutions based on previous conversations.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent: Want to suggest articles or products to users based on their past behavior? Flowise AI‚Äôs embeddings and vector stores make it easy to build a recommendation engine that‚Äôs spot-on. Think Siri or Alexa but custom-built for your specific needs. Whether it‚Äôs setting reminders or fetching the latest news, Flowise AI‚Äôs tools and chat models can help you create a virtual assistant that‚Äôs both smart and engaging.

metadata.title: What is Flowise AI ? A Comprehensive Overview
metadata.snippet: Explore Flowise AI: an open-source tool for building advanced Language Learning Models. Uncover its unique features and the power of Flowise.

pageContent:
With the right chat models and embeddings, you can build a real-time translation service that breaks down language barriers, making the world a little smaller and a lot more connected.
Want to know what people are saying about your brand on social media? Flowise AI can help you build a sentiment analysis tool that scans through text and gauges public opinion.
So, there you have it! Flowise AI is your go-to open-source tool for building sophisticated Language Learning Model (LLM) apps. From its user-friendly interface to its extensive customization options, it‚Äôs designed to make your life easier at every step.
Interested in diving deeper into the world of LLMs? Check out our article on LangChain for more insights.
